ticket.title: ActiveRecord::find_in_batches bug or feature?
ticket.original-body:
yeilding within with_scope propogates scope of the results of queries inside the yielded block
is it a designed feature/behavior or just a bug?
more info at
http://ep.blogware.com/blog/_archives/2009/3/4/4112179.html

version.body:
typo
yeilding within with_scope propogates scope to the queries inside the yielded block

typo

version.title: ActiveRecord::find_in_batches bug or feature?

version.body:
nice catch, check out bug 2128: http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/2260-find_in_batches-updates-2-bugs
I applied a fix for this to the latest version of batches.rb attached to that bug (comment #1)
version.body-html:
nice catch, check out bug 2128: http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/p...

version.title: ActiveRecord::find_in_batches bug or feature?

version.body:
Evgeniy or Eric, did you ever reach a resolution here? This ticket is still marked incomplete, as is #2128 (http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/2260-find_in_batches-updates-2-bugs). Eric's patch was for 2 separate issues and didn't directly address the problem in this ticket.
If it has stalled, I'd be happy to write the failing spec & patch. I agree with the original post; I think it needs fixing.
version.body-html:
Evgeniy or Eric, did you ever reach a resolution here? This ticket is still marked incomplete, as is #2128 (http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/.... Eric's patch was for 2 separate issues and didn't directly address the problem in this ticket.

If it has stalled, I'd be happy to write the failing spec & patch. I agree with the original post; I think it needs fixing.
version.title: ActiveRecord::find_in_batches bug or feature?

version.body:
I've got the scope fix in:
https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2227-batches-conditions-for-each-are-applied-to-each-modelfind-within-the-each-loop
With tests and all. As Benjamin mentioned, this ticket is also following the same issue:
https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets/2260-find_in_batches-updates-2-bugs
version.body-html:
I've got the scope fix in:

https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2227-batches-...

https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994-ruby-on-rails/tickets...

version.body: If you are after a pair of great looking and style UGG boots to wear during the winter months, then you can not go far wrong with getting yourself a pair of the ugg classic crochet Tall’s. Even though these boots have been around for a few years now they are likely to grow in popularity now. This is because they were recently featured in Oprah Winfrey’s Favorite Things show. The UGG Classic Crochet is a new addition to the popular Classic collection with its slouchy styling and colorful knit uppers (polyester and wool blend). A sheepskin footbed provides the extra comfort that UGG boot and ugg classic crochet is well-known for. A light and flexible outsole paired with a new decorative label makes this boot perfect for spring. The Classic Crochet boot can be cuffed or styled any creative way to personalize your look. As with the UGG Classic Cardy boot, the Crochet can either be worn with jeans. Or you can wear them pushed down so that they have slouched feel and look to them. But it does not matter what they are worn with or they way in which they are worn they will still help you to make quite a statement about yourself. Today’s women have become fashion conscious. They are going to almost any extent to look good and attractive. It has become important to look good. In fact, it is one of the most important factors that will decide success in various areas of life. It can boost up your confidence level. As mentioned earlier the uggs for cheapCrochet Tall boots are going to grow in popularity this season, just because Oprah Winfrey included them in her Favorite Things show. Not only does she like the boots styling and colors (black, sand, rum raisin). The reason they are one of her favorite things is because she says it feels like she is walking on a cloud when she wears them.
version.body-html:
If you are after a pair of great looking and style UGG boots to wear during the winter months, then you can not go far wrong with getting yourself a pair of the ugg classic crochet Tall’s. Even though these boots have been around for a few years now they are likely to grow in popularity now. This is because they were recently featured in Oprah Winfrey’s Favorite Things show.
The UGG Classic Crochet is a new addition to the popular Classic collection with its slouchy styling and colorful knit uppers (polyester and wool blend). A sheepskin footbed provides the extra comfort that UGG boot and ugg classic crochet is well-known for. A light and flexible outsole paired with a new decorative label makes this boot perfect for spring. The Classic Crochet boot can be cuffed or styled any creative way to personalize your look. As with the UGG Classic Cardy boot, the Crochet can either be worn with jeans. Or you can wear them pushed down so that they have slouched feel and look to them. But it does not matter what they are worn with or they way in which they are worn they will still help you to make quite a statement about yourself. Today’s women have become fashion conscious. They are going to almost any extent to look good and attractive. It has become important to look good. In fact, it is one of the most important factors that will decide success in various areas of life. It can boost up your confidence level.
As mentioned earlier the uggs for cheapCrochet Tall boots are going to grow in popularity this season, just because Oprah Winfrey included them in her Favorite Things show. Not only does she like the boots styling and colors (black, sand, rum raisin). The reason they are one of her favorite things is because she says it feels like she is walking on a cloud when she wears them.
